m_szDocSumamry: by helloposco POSCO received the Innovation of the Year Steelie Award at the World Steel Associationâ€™s 49th Annual Conference in Chicago, USA, on October 13 in recognition of its efforts in developing lean duplex stainless steel with super ductility using a strip-casting process. This recently developed innovation maintains moldability and corrosion resistance of normal stainless steel grades while greatly lowering the content of expensive raw materials such as nickel and molybdenum, raising cost competitiveness.
